channel.title: Too lazy to get my own money. (Discuss botting and RS Gold sites here)
channel.description:
One of the main reasons I quit RS was because I was poor. (Only had 17 mil)
Now they sell gold farming for like 20m for 13 dollars.
Is it worth it?

item.title: Too lazy to get my own money. (Discuss botting and RS Gold sites here)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:87, topic:344802”]all i do for money and skills is make keyloggers, well i don’t anymore, i made one actually and got a low level skiller. What you do is get vb2010 and make a keylogger, then make a youtube video of your server pretending it’s rs, then release it as a miracle money generator. people believe anything[/quote]I did this like 10 years ago for neopets. ‘Neopets Item Giver’.

Read full topic

item.title: Too lazy to get my own money. (Discuss botting and RS Gold sites here)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:84, topic:344802”]35m is cheap? That’s still the most expensive skill besides maybe prayer…

Wtf do you mean ‘clay hammers’.

EDIT - Oh sacred clay. Those are only like 30k exp each though… and it only cuts the price in half. So that’s still over 50m[/quote]

No, they supply 50,750 experience before breaking and are easy to obtain. At level 74 you create dungeon oak doors, which will equal out to about 35M from 74-99. One of my clan-mates recently did this and only lost that much.

35M isn’t as much to me as it is to you. Look through this thread, and the last post by me especially:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,407777.0.html

Also, 35M is nowhere near the most expensive skill. Heblore, prayer, smithing, crafting, and summoning will all cost above that. By naming these skills I am talking about buying supplies, not obtaining them yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Too lazy to get my own money. (Discuss botting and RS Gold sites here)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:81, topic:344802”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=441178.msg3246412#msg3246412 date=1277406748]
I do Construction and host house parties, that’s how I spend most of my money. I have 70 construction, which cost me about 13m.
[/quote]

Construction is a cheap skill to level. If you take the time to get clay hammers, 74-99 is ~35M. It’ll be my next 99 after fishing, which is currently at 274k experience to level 96.[/quote]35m is cheap? That’s still the most expensive skill besides maybe prayer…

Wtf do you mean ‘clay hammers’.

EDIT - Oh sacred clay. Those are only like 30k exp each though… and it only cuts the price in half. So that’s still over 50m

Read full topic

item.title: Too lazy to get my own money. (Discuss botting and RS Gold sites here)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:78, topic:344802”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=441178.msg3246412#msg3246412 date=1277406748]

So what is the point in the game if your just going to bot the money? Like what are you getting out of playing the game? Runescape Classic i understand why but Runescape now is boring as hell without good ol days of pking… That is only reason people bot. I tryed pking on Runescape couple months ago and i must say i really hated it…
[/quote]I do Construction and host house parties, that’s how I spend most of my money. I have 70 construction, which cost me about 13m.

Thats all I used to do too. I spent all the money I had on construction and have prolly put about 40m into it with currently like a 20m house. And when I found out about the crystal saw i was like OMFG better stuff and I dont gotta lvl[/quote]Yeah, I’m level 70 con with a G Altar. People are like OMG!?

But just an update on my purchase:
Going a bit longer than expected, but it’s worth it. Turns out that by checking my adventurers log, they actually have raised my Mining level from 65 to 72. I think that makes it worth it.

Read full topic

Thats all I used to do too. I spent all the money I had on construction and have prolly put about 40m into it with currently like a 20m house. And when I found out about the crystal saw i was like OMFG better stuff and I dont gotta lvl

item.title: Too lazy to get my own money. (Discuss botting and RS Gold sites here)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:67, topic:344802”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=441178.msg3241535#msg3241535 date=1276973832]

[quote author=casey. link=topic=441178.msg3241167#msg3241167 date=1276943467]

It’s the farming method, not quick transfer. (Tho this site is cheapest for both)
http://www.rs2moneyvip.com/runescapemoney/

never heard of them, scam.

Use what I’ve used:

usfine.com

Runescape Gold,Runescape Money,WoW Gold,Buy WoW Gold,World of Warcraft Gold,WoW...

Usfine.com is an Online Game Store,NO1 Runescape Seller! We Offer Cheap Runescape Gold,MapleStory Mesos,WoW Gold,Aion Gold,FFXIV Gil,Runescape Powerleveling,And Other More Service!


Trusted, usually quick, hand trained. If you buy use discount code ‘catherine’

or a trusted Sythe gold trader. You can post here and I’ll tell you if you can trust.

Don’t use Gold4RS
[/quote]Just because you’ve never heard of them doesn’t mean it’s a scam.

usfine is twice as expensive, no way. Mine is also hand trained/farmed.

I used gold4rs for my first ever purchase of gold farming (1m) and it worked fine? It was done within an hour.
[/quote]they didnt do anything cause 1m = little money; when you order big they fuck you over big[/quote]It seems to me that if I owned a business like this, I would care less about someone that bought 1m than someone that bought more. I’d be afraid of something like a PayPal case, whereas with 1m they could do nothing about it.

item.title: Too lazy to get my own money. (Discuss botting and RS Gold sites here)
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:64, topic:344802”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=441178.msg3244959#msg3244959 date=1277272879]

The only skill I’ve botted is Woodcutting. I went from level ~57 to 82 using RSBot Yew Chopper and Ivy Chopper. No bans.

Half of the people at ivy vines are bots anyway and obviously don’t report.
[/quote]I’m such a noob tho. Right when I get there I report everyone else Then I wait about 5 minutes and start botting.[/quote]

I’m hoping you are joking. That isn’t gonna “help” you, usually jagex bans after 1 month therefore they’ll be there even if you reported them if they leave the bot in the same world, same area.

I just hate those botters who’ll baby-sit there bot, and then you come and they try to “show off” there skills, or start calling you “poor” randomly, and thinking there good:x…

Read full topic
